resources.string: Guess my number by typing it
You guess my number! What do you want to do now?
No this time! But don\'t give up and try again ;)
Are you sure to exit this level?
Are you sure to exit the application?
The game is based on the task of guessing a number drawn by the computer, which is within the range given in the upper left corner of the screen.
When playing on the easiest level, 3 lives are available. After using all the chances, an appropriate message will be displayed.

On medium and hard levels, gameplay is based on following the instructions above the input field. When you finish playing a level and exit to the menu, the number of attempts made will be saved in the last results.
